import classes from './Cart.module.css' import React from 'react' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../store/Cart-Context' const Cart = props => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) const cartItems =
    {cartCtx.items.map(item =>
  • {item.name}
    • )}
return {cartItems}
Total Amount 35.62
} export default Cart;
